channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
So I tried to separate the commands from the client(obviously I'm using delta) blindly and after making sure the commands work then compiling I get this:
.\src\Client.java:3439: non-static method customCommand(Client,java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context Commands.customCommand(this, command); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Since I'm still learning about java I still don't know how to fix this Thanks

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @galade57465746 galade57465746
item.description:
@galade57465746 wrote:

I tried this
new Commands().customCommand(this, command);
and it worked
Thanks

Read full topic
